# Appmod Docs

## GitHub Copilot app modernization for .NET

- [Predefined Tasks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/predefined-tasks.md): Learn about the predefined tasks that are available for GitHub Copilot app modernization for .NET
- [Working with assessment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/working-with-assessment.md): Learn how to effectively work with application assessments in GitHub Copilot app modernization, including configuration, interpretation, and report management.
- [Quickstart - Assess and migrate a .NET project](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/quickstart.md): Learn how to assess and migrate a .NET project by using GitHub Copilot app modernization for .NET.
- [Quickstart - Containerize a .NET project](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/containerization.md): Learn how to containerize your .NET project using GitHub Copilot app modernization for .NET.
- [Quickstart - Deploy a .NET project to Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/deploy.md): Learn how to deploy your migrated .NET project to Azure by using GitHub Copilot app modernization for .NET.
- [Quickstart - Migrate a .NET project using Copilot Coding Agent](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/coding-agent-support.md): Overview of migrating .NET applications to Azure using GitHub Copilot app modernization in the Copilot Coding Agent.
- [Quickstart - Migrate a .NET project using the Copilot CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/copilot-cli-support.md): Overview of migrating .NET applications to Azure using GitHub Copilot app modernization in Copilot CLI.
- [Sample - Contoso University](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/azure/migration/appmod/sample.md): Learn about the sample project for GitHub Copilot app modernization for .NET
